3FBA74BE.Line5.1029AF: Heavens above, forgive me. I must go visit my son.

6736CAFC.Line3.1029AF: I sent my sweet boy away for a sin of my own making. The blood is on my hands...all of it.

8EB3213A.Line1.1029AF: Yet I still feel him...I still hear his cries! I will never be free of the truth...

DEE94D07.VoiceDir1.1029AF: A horse voice full if hysteria, slowly giving way to clarity of purpose.
